review: The stick works just like the regular Roku. My Apps automatically loaded to this one. It works great.The screen mirroring feature says beta. My galaxy s5 will connect most of the time. Sometimes it takes multiple tries. The video is choppy sometimes. My Galaxy Tab will not connect. When they fix the issues, then maybe another star.
author: D. Kozdras

review: I have been using a this device for the last two months and I can watch shows and use the apps...eventually. Sometimes Hulu will not load the shows and I have to restart the app, sometimes Netflix takes forever to load. I do not think it is my internet connection but I am not sure. This device loses one whole star because of the remote control. I have basically thrown it in the trash because I had to reset the device three times a day just to get the remote to reconnect. I use my iPhone as a remote now which can be annoying. Beaing able to move it to deifferent TVs, especially when traveling is great. The Roku platform itself is great and maybe the other Roku items will be more reliable but I am not completely sold on the streaming stick.
